Action.author: mhbauer
Action.body: We can add either specific polling intervals to tests, or utilize the SetDefaultEventually and SetDefaultPollingEventually functions to somewhat more globally toggle the timeouts.

Action.author: mhbauer
Action.body: I think we need to end up with a policy of always fully specifying the timeouts and polling interval, as it's otherwise at the mercy of anybody in the call stack whimsically setting the defaults to some other value.
